posts.subject: Live in the New Life
posts.title: Christ the Center
posts.text: Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, he is a new creation; the old has gone, the new has come!

posts.subject: Live in the New Life
posts.title: Christ the Center
posts.text: I have been crucified with Christ and I no longer live, but Christ lives in me. The life I live in the body, I live by faith in the Son of God, who loves me and gave Himself for me

posts.subject: Live in the New Life
posts.title: Obedience to Christ
posts.text: Therefore, I urge you, brothers, in view of Godâ€™s mercy, to offer your bodies as living sacrifices, holy and pleasing to God-this is your spiritual act of worship

posts.subject: Live in the New Life
posts.title: Obedience to Christ
posts.text: Whoever has my commands and obeys them, he is the one who loves me. He who loves me will be loved by my Father, and I too will love him and show myself to him.

posts.subject: Live in the New Life
posts.title: The Word
posts.text: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness

posts.subject: Live in the New Life
posts.title: The Word
posts.text: Do not let this Book of the Law depart from your mouth; meditate on it day and night, so that you may be careful to do everything written in it. Then you will be prosperous and successful

posts.subject: Live in the New Life
posts.title: Prayer
posts.text: If you remain in me and my words remain in you, ask whatever you wish, and it will be given you

posts.subject: Live in the New Life
posts.title: Prayer
posts.text: Do not be anxious about anything, but in everything, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God. And the peace of God, which transcends all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus

posts.subject: Live in the New Life
posts.title: Fellowship
posts.text: For where two or three come together in my name, there am I with them

posts.subject: Live in the New Life
posts.title: Fellowship
posts.text: And let us consider how we may spur one another on toward love and good deeds. Let us not give up meeting together, as some are in the habit of doing, but let us encourage one another-and all the more as you see the Day approaching

posts.subject: Live in the New Life
posts.title: Witnessing
posts.text: Come, follow me, Jesus said, and I will make you fishers of men

posts.subject: Live in the New Life
posts.title: Witnessing
posts.text: I am not ashamed of the gospel, because it is the power of God for the salvation of everyone who believes: first for the Jew, then for the Gentile.
